channel.title: [delta] changing coords desitination of home spell [delta]
channel.description:
this is my home spell in my spell book:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/homespell.jpg[/img]
currently it takes me to edgeville, how do i change the coords i takes players?

item.title: [delta] changing coords desitination of home spell [delta]
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Alright this is easy for delta. tele to your current home and do not move type ::mypos Search for the first number the AbsX then open up clickingmost.java
search for case 4140: Then as you see below there will be c.triggertele(####, ####, 0); Change The to your new home so if i moved mine it’d be c.triggertele(3056, 2444, 0); The first 4 numbers are the AbsX and the second numbers will be the AbsY so when you do ::mypos you will see AbsX; ####, AbsY #### So you swap the number you have At triggertele to your mypos numbers
I know i wrote this difficultly or hard to understand im sorry but i didnt know how to word it. hopefully this helps

case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(3087, 3488, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;

thats edgeville home

Read full topic

[/quote]

Easy, Tele to it do ::mypos find the coords in Clickingmost.java
(Like the coords are : 2100 3000 search for 2100 and u will find something.

Tell me if it work :D[/quote]

i searched both the coords up one at a time in clickingmost.java and nothing came up… can some1 plz help me?
